topics.body: Earlier this morning, I talked with QuasarNova in the Dragon Ball thread, and then I realized that, all things considered, the animation quality of DBZ, barring the fillers, surprisingly holds up. Seriously, it was actually surprising how good the battles look even a decade later. Just compare Goku's transformation into a Super Saiyan and a Super Saiyan 3, and then compare it to Naruto's transformation into his One-Tailed Fox form.

Yeah, Naruto's ain't all that impressive. What's that, Naruto? An aura surrounded you when you transformed that was so powerful it sent waves? Bitch, please.
